revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Moon |image = [[File:Mt._Moon.png]] |caption = A map of Mt. Moon. |tokens = 75 |location = East of Pewter City, between Route 3 and 4. }} '''Mt. Moon''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Random Encounters==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Encounter !! Base Health !! Trainer !! Pokémon !! Boss !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | <center>N/A || <center>N/A || rowspan=2|[[File:Super_Nerd.png|40px]] Super Nerd Miguel || rowspan=2|[[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer, [[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing || rowspan=2|<center>2,780 |- |} '''* Must have cleared Mt. Moon at least once to unlock Kabuto and Omanyte'''
